body: thanks for reporting, it's a valid bug
We can give it to you to fix, if you don't mind?
Keep in mind that we should reproduce the problem first in a unit test, make sure it fails, commit, and then make a fix, commit and submit pull request. I'm sure you know how TDD works :)
@yegor256 yes, will do right away! hey @asinyagin, many thanks, I just added **15 mins** to your account, payment ID is `DA2084610`
Task's budget is **30 mins** (see [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for explanation)
@asinyagin it's yours now, please proceed keeping in mind [our principles](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). Feel free to ask any technical questions right here in the ticket

issue.body: Puzzle `1-8ecc5826` in `src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/Gist.java:55-55` has to be resolved: New method fork() to fork a gist. Let's introduce a new method, as explained in http://developer.github.com/v3/gists/#fork-a-gist. The method should be tested in a unit and integration tests. When done, remove this comment.
